page.title: 05Education
page.content: A three tier education system exists in Grimethorpe and the surrounding area-Shafton, Brierley and Cudworth. There are four 5-9yrs. and three 5-10yrs. first schools, two 9-13yrs. and one 10-13yrs. middle school and one 13-18yrs. high school.There are good links between first-middle-and high school to ensure good continuity and progression throughout the comprehensive system. The schools in Grimethorpe have the support of parent groups to raise money for extra equipment and to purchase and maintain mini-buses. Milefield Middle and Springvale Middle Schools have strong links with Lille in N.France.Exchanges are made with primary schools and with Lille University Sports Club to play rugby.
